channel.title: The Great Barrington Declaration on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in The Great Barrington Declaration on The Majority

item.title: A Deadly Virus?
item.description: I have never been someone who has stuck to convention and blindly followed accepted normal practices, either in my work or, indeed, in my private life. Don’t get me wrong - I don’t break laws, but I am prepared to ‘think outside the box’ and look at things in a different way, if something doesn’t feel right. And I am not alone, as many of the great inventions and medical/scientific breakthroughs have happened because someone dared to look at things differently from the general population and the peers in their field.
